com.app.model

Class BootstrapDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.app.model.BootstrapDAO

  • public class BootstrapDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Important DAO to manage connections and access to bootstrap csv data into application database

      • read

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> read(java.lang.String fileHeader)
        Takes in the fileHeader(filename.extension) of the csv file, and parses it into the environment
        Parameters:
        fileHeader - the column names
        Returns:
        List - a List of String[], with each String[] representing a line of the file.

      • resetStage

        public static void resetStage()
        To reset the static "staging area" before the start of each validation Used by BootstrapServlet to clear all data AFTER bootstrapping is done.

      • validate

        public static void validate(java.lang.String whichCSV,
            java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> someEntries)
        Parameters:
        whichCSV - - to indicate which CSV file you are validating - e.g. student.csv, course.csv, section.csv, etc.
        entries - - the List returned by the read()

      • getColumnNumber

        private static int getColumnNumber(java.lang.String header,
                  java.lang.String[] fieldHeaders)
        Get fieldHeaders and identify their corresponding column numbers.
        Parameters:
        header - column name
        fieldHeaders - the entire row of column names
        Returns:
        - columnNumber that represents the order dictated in the CSV file - value of -1, if no such header is found within the row of "column names"/"field headers"
